docs.title: 🚀 Welcome to AgentVerse 🌌
docs.text: "Explore the universe of AI agents, RAG tutorials, and cutting-edge LLM applications."

docs.title: 🌟 What is AgentVerse?
docs.text:
AgentVerse is a futuristic collection of advanced LLM apps powered by: - 🤖 AI Agents - 📚 Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) - 🧠 Memory-enabled LLM applications - 🎯 Finetuning tutorials using the latest open-source models

Leveraging technologies from OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and more, AgentVerse empowers you to build scalable, intelligent solutions.

docs.title: 🚀 Explore the Universe of Agents
docs.text: 🔗 Navigate through the cosmos: - 🧩 AI Agents – Intelligent conversational assistants. - 🔎 RAG Tutorials – Build smarter search-based models. - 🧠 LLM Apps with Memory – Context-aware applications. - 🛠️ Advanced Tools & Frameworks – Expand agent capabilities. - 🎓 Finetuning LLaMA 3.2 – Master model customization.

docs.title: 🧭 Why AgentVerse?
docs.text: ✨ Innovative: Stay ahead with state-of-the-art AI solutions. ⚡ Fast & Scalable: Build robust applications effortlessly. 🌍 Open-Source: Fully accessible and community-driven.

docs.title: 🌐 Get Involved
docs.text: 💻 Contribute on GitHub | ⭐ Star the project | 📢 Share your ideas!

docs.title: 📝 License
docs.text:
AgentVerse is licensed under the Apache License 2.0.

🚀 Embark on a journey through the AgentVerse and revolutionize the future of AI. 🌠

docs.title: Advanced_tool_Frameworks
docs.text:
🌟 AgentVerse

A curated collection of awesome LLM apps built with RAG and AI agents. This repository features LLM apps that use models from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and open-source models like DeepSeek, Qwen or Llama that you can run locally on your computer.

docs.title: 🤔 Why AgentVerse?
docs.text:
• 💡 Discover practical and creative ways LLMs can be applied across different domains, from code repositories to email inboxes and more.
  • 🔥 Explore apps that combine LLMs from OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and open-source alternatives with RAG and AI Agents.

docs.title: Advanced Tools and Frameworks
docs.text:
• 🧪 Gemini Multimodal Chatbot
  • 🔄 Mixture of Agents
  • 🌐 MultiLLM Chat Playground
  • 🔗 LLM Router App
  • 💬 Local ChatGPT Clone
  • 🌍 Web Scraping AI Agent
  • 🔍 Web Search AI Assistant
  • 🧪 Cursor AI Experiments
